name: response-handler
description: A maven dependency that handles response body, catches exceptions, supports for openapi.

scripts.release:github: mvn -s settings.xml clean deploy -P github -am -pl response-handler-core -DCI_RELEASE_URL=https://maven.pkg.github.com/UNICKCHENG/Response-Handler
scripts.tag: git add pom.xml package.json CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "ci: update the version to v%npm_package_version%" && git tag v%npm_package_version%

author: unickcheng
